share on x ac alton and jo. ann colwell. jun 20 at 2:06 pm so sorry to hear of richard's passing. our thoughts and prayers are with the family. alton and jo. ann colwell. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jc jenny cowan-smith. jun 20 at 1:10 pm to all of richard's family, i am so sorry to hear about his passing. praying for each of you during this time. may god be with each of you. love to all. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 22. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm conner-westbury funeral home1891 west mc. intosh road. griffin, ga, usget order flowers now for richard's visitation service. jun 23. chapel of conner-westbury funeral home1891 w. mc. intosh rd. griffin, ga, usget order flowers now for richard's service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe conner-westbury funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
